accueil.subTitle: Project description
accueil.desc: The project involves creating an administrator interface linked to the back-end and database created during the integration course.

validationProductForm.titleMin: The title must contain a minimum of 2 characters
validationProductForm.titleMax: The title must not contain more than 50 characters
validationProductForm.descriptionMax: Description must not contain more than 255 characters
validationProductForm.price: The price is required and may only contain numbers.

validationCategoryForm.nameMin: The name must contain a minimum of 2 characters
validationCategoryForm.nameMax: The name must not contain more than 50 characters
